verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things the <S%G2962>LORD<s%> <S%G322>appointed<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G1440>seventy<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> and <S%G649>sent<s%> them <S%G1417>two<s%> and two <S%G4253>before<s%> his <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> and <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G3195>would<s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he to them, The <S%G2326>harvest<s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> is <S%G4183>great,<s%> but the laborers <S%G2040><s%> are <S%G3641>few:<s%> <S%G1189>pray<s%> you therefore the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of the <S%G2326>harvest,<s%> that he would <S%G1544>send<s%> <S%G1544>forth<s%> <S%G2040>laborers<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his harvest. <S%G2326><s%>
<S%G4198>Go<s%> your ways: <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I <S%G649>send<s%> you <S%G649>forth<s%> as <S%G704>lambs<s%> among <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319><s%> wolves. <S%G3074><s%>

<S%G941>Carry<s%> <S%G3361>neither<s%> <S%G905>purse,<s%> <S%G3361>nor<s%> <S%G4082>money,<s%> <S%G3361>nor<s%> <S%G5266>shoes:<s%> and <S%G782>salute<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> by the way. <S%G3598><s%>

And <S%G1519>into<s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> you <S%G1525>enter,<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to <S%G5129>this<s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>

And <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> be <S%G1563>there,<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> shall <S%G1879>rest<s%> on it: <S%G1490>if<s%> not, it shall <S%G344>turn<s%> to you again. <S%G344><s%>

And in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G3306>remain,<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> and <S%G4095>drinking<s%> such things as they <S%G3844>give:<s%> for the <S%G2040>laborer<s%> is <S%G514>worthy<s%> of his <S%G3408>hire.<s%> <S%G3327>Go<s%> not from <S%G3614>house<s%> to house. <S%G3614><s%>

And <S%G1519>into<s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> you <S%G1525>enter,<s%> and they <S%G1209>receive<s%> you, <S%G2068>eat<s%> such things as are <S%G3908>set<s%> <S%G3908>before<s%> you:

And <S%G2323>heal<s%> the <S%G772>sick<s%> that are therein, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G3004>say<s%> to them, The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1448>come<s%> <S%G1448>near<s%> to you.

But <S%G1519>into<s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> you <S%G1525>enter,<s%> and they <S%G1209>receive<s%> you not, <S%G1831>go<s%> your ways out <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4113>streets<s%> of the <S%G846>same,<s%> and say, <S%G2036><s%>

<S%G2532>Even<s%> the very <S%G2868>dust<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2853>sticks<s%> on us, we do <S%G631>wipe<s%> <S%G631>off<s%> against you: <S%G4133>notwithstanding<s%> be you <S%G1097>sure<s%> of <S%G5124>this,<s%> that the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1448>come<s%> <S%G1448>near<s%> to you.
But I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that it shall be <S%G414>more<s%> <S%G414>tolerable<s%> in that <S%G2250>day<s%> for <S%G4670>Sodom,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for that city. <S%G4172><s%>

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> to you, <S%G5523>Chorazin!<s%> <S%G3759>woe<s%> to you, <S%G966>Bethsaida!<s%> for <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1411>mighty<s%> works had been <S%G1096>done<s%> in <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> and <S%G4605>Sidon,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> have been <S%G1096>done<s%> in you, they had a <S%G3819>great<s%> while <S%G3819>ago<s%> <S%G3340>repented,<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> in <S%G4526>sackcloth<s%> and ashes. <S%G4700><s%>
But it shall be <S%G414>more<s%> <S%G414>tolerable<s%> for <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> and <S%G4605>Sidon<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for you.
And you, <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G5312>exalted<s%> to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> shall be <S%G2601>thrust<s%> <S%G2601>down<s%> to hell. <S%G86><s%>

He that <S%G191>hears<s%> you <S%G191>hears<s%> me; and he that <S%G114>despises<s%> you <S%G114>despises<s%> me; and he that <S%G114>despises<s%> me <S%G114>despises<s%> him that <S%G649>sent<s%> me.

And the <S%G1440>seventy<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G5290>again<s%> with <S%G5479>joy,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G1140>devils<s%> are <S%G5293>subject<s%> to us <S%G1722>through<s%> your <S%G3686>name.<s%>
And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, I <S%G2334>beheld<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> as <S%G796>lightning<s%> <S%G4098>fall<s%> from heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> to you <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G3961>tread<s%> <S%G1883>on<s%> <S%G3789>serpents<s%> and <S%G4651>scorpions,<s%> and <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of the <S%G2190>enemy:<s%> and <S%G3762>nothing<s%> shall by <S%G3364>any<s%> <S%G3364>means<s%> <S%G91>hurt<s%> you.

<S%G4133>Notwithstanding<s%> in <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> not, that the <S%G4151>spirits<s%> are <S%G5293>subject<s%> to you; but <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> are <S%G1125>written<s%> in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

In that <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G21>rejoiced<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> I <S%G1843>thank<s%> you, O <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and <S%G1093>earth,<s%> that you have <S%G613>hid<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things from the <S%G4680>wise<s%> and <S%G4908>prudent,<s%> and have <S%G601>revealed<s%> them to <S%G3516>babes:<s%> <S%G3483>even<s%> <S%G3488>so,<s%> <S%G3962>Father;<s%> for <S%G3779>so<s%> it seemed <S%G1096><s%> <S%G2107><s%> good in your sight. <S%G1715><s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> things are <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to me of my <S%G3962>Father:<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> is, but the <S%G3962>Father;<s%> and <S%G5101>who<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> is, but the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> and he to <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1014>will<s%> reveal <S%G601><s%> him.

And he <S%G4762>turned<s%> him to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2596>privately,<s%> <S%G2398><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G991>see<s%> the things that you see: <S%G991><s%>

For I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, that <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and <S%G935>kings<s%> have <S%G2309>desired<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> those things <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G991>see,<s%> and have not seen <S%G1492><s%> them; and to <S%G191>hear<s%> those things <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G191>hear,<s%> and have not heard <S%G191><s%> them.

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3544>lawyer<s%> <S%G450>stood<s%> up, and <S%G1598>tempted<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life?<s%>
He <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G5101>What<s%> is <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G3551>law?<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> you?

And he <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> You shall <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> your <S%G2316>God<s%> with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G5590>soul,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G2479>strength,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G1271>mind;<s%> and your <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as <S%G4572>yourself.<s%>
And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, You have <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3723>right:<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4160>do,<s%> and you shall live. <S%G2198><s%>
But he, <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G1344>justify<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> And <S%G5101>who<s%> is my <S%G4139>neighbor?<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5274>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> A certain <S%G5100><s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%G2410>Jericho,<s%> and <S%G4045>fell<s%> <S%G4045>among<s%> <S%G3027>thieves,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1562>stripped<s%> him of his raiment, and wounded <S%G4127><s%> <S%G2007><s%> him, and <S%G565>departed,<s%> leaving <S%G863><s%> him <S%G2253>half<s%> dead. <S%G2253><s%>

And by <S%G4795>chance<s%> there <S%G2597>came<s%> down a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> that <S%G3598>way:<s%> and when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, he <S%G492>passed<s%> by on the <S%G492>other<s%> side. <S%G492><s%>

And <S%G3668>likewise<s%> a <S%G3019>Levite,<s%> when he was <S%G2596>at<s%> the <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and looked <S%G1492><s%> on him, and <S%G492>passed<s%> by on the <S%G492>other<s%> side. <S%G492><s%>
But a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4541>Samaritan,<s%> as he <S%G3593>journeyed,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2596>where<s%> he was: and when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, he had compassion <S%G4697><s%> on him,

And <S%G4334>went<s%> to him, and <S%G2611>bound<s%> up his <S%G5134>wounds,<s%> pouring in <S%G1637>oil<s%> and <S%G3631>wine,<s%> and <S%G1913>set<s%> him <S%G1909>on<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2934>beast,<s%> and <S%G71>brought<s%> him to an <S%G3829>inn,<s%> and <S%G1959>took<s%> <S%G1959>care<s%> of him.

And <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G839>morrow<s%> when he <S%G1831>departed,<s%> he <S%G1544>took<s%> out <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1220>pence,<s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> them to the <S%G3830>host,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, Take <S%G1959>care<s%> of him; and whatever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> you <S%G4325>spend<s%> <S%G4325>more,<s%> when <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> I <S%G1880>come<s%> <S%G1880>again,<s%> I will <S%G591>repay<s%> you.

<S%G5101>Which<s%> <S%G3767>now<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G5140>three,<s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> you, was <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> to him that <S%G1706>fell<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> the thieves? <S%G3027><s%>

And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> He that <S%G4160>showed<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> <S%G3326>on<s%> him. <S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to him, <S%G4198>Go,<s%> and <S%G4160>do<s%> you likewise. <S%G3668><s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, as they <S%G4198>went,<s%> that he <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2968>village:<s%> and a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G3136>Martha<s%> <S%G5264>received<s%> him <S%G1519>into<s%> her <S%G3624>house.<s%>

And she <S%G1510>had<s%> a <S%G79>sister<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> which <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3869>sat<s%> <S%G3844>at<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus'<s%> <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and <S%G191>heard<s%> his <S%G3056>word.<s%>

But <S%G3136>Martha<s%> was <S%G4049>encumbered<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G1248>serving,<s%> and <S%G2186>came<s%> to him, and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> do you not <S%G3199>care<s%> that my <S%G79>sister<s%> has <S%G2641>left<s%> me to <S%G1247>serve<s%> <S%G3441>alone?<s%> <S%G2036>bid<s%> her <S%G3767>therefore<s%> that she <S%G4878>help<s%> me.

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to her, <S%G3136>Martha,<s%> <S%G3136>Martha,<s%> you are <S%G3309>careful<s%> and <S%G5182>troubled<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> things:

But <S%G1520>one<s%> thing is <S%G5532>needful:<s%> and <S%G3137>Mary<s%> has <S%G1586>chosen<s%> that <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G3310>part,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> shall not be <S%G851>taken<s%> <S%G851>away<s%> from her.
